testimonials.name: Ray
testimonials.content: I am thrilled about the idea of Ideavault! As someone who's interested in investing but intimidated by the complexity of the stock market, Ideavault's pre-built portfolios aligned with specific investment themes sound perfect for me.

testimonials.name: Anushka Wadhwa
testimonials.content: I've always been wary of investing in the stock market due to the high risks involved. But with Ideavault's diverse portfolios, I feel more confident in my investment decisions.

testimonials.name: Yuvraj Bhandari
testimonials.content: Ideavault could be a game-changer for the investment industry. I love the idea of having access to curated portfolios at an affordable cost, and the real-time updates on performance are a great bonus.

testimonials.name: Arushi Goyal
testimonials.content: As someone who wants to invest but doesn't have the time to research individual stocks, Ideavault is a godsend. I can trust the SFC-approved experts to create portfolios aligned with my investment goals.

testimonials.name: Smaran Goli
testimonials.content: I'm excited to see how Ideavault will innovate the investment industry. The concept of pre-built portfolios aligned with specific themes is already a game-changer, and I can't wait to see what other features the platform will offer.

testimonials.name: Sarthak Khanna
testimonials.content: Ideavault's focus on renewable energy is admirable. I want to invest in companies that are making a positive impact on the environment, and Ideavault makes it easy to do so.

testimonials.name: Sathya Balaji
testimonials.content: The idea of niche ideavaults is fascinating! I can't wait to see what kind of portfolios Ideavault will offer that cater to specific regions or industries.

testimonials.name: Martin Carol John
testimonials.content: I appreciate how Ideavault simplifies the investing process. The fact that I can buy pre-built portfolios with just a few clicks is a huge relief, especially compared to the complicated and costly traditional brokers.

testimonials.name: Pulkit Lahoti
testimonials.content: I appreciate the transparency of Ideavault. By providing information on the experts who create the idea vaults, I feel more confident in my investment decisions.

testimonials.name: Justin
testimonials.content: I've always wanted to invest in the stock market, but I never knew where to start. With Ideavault, I feel like I have a clear path to follow that aligns with my interests and investment goals.

ideavaults.name: Tech & Edge
ideavaults.subtitle: Managed by Spandan Barve
ideavaults.description: Create wealth with tech, stay protected with AI. The sweet spot
about: This smallcase invests in Equity & Gold, fixing their weights to 70% and 30%.
smallcase invests in large-cap companies using Nippon India ETF Nifty Bees
> Large cap companies are usually well established and the chances of such companies going bust are low
> Adding such stocks to the portfolio increases stability of the portfolio as their stock prices are not very volatile. They are also best suited for long term wealth creation
smallcase invests in Gold using Nippon India ETF Gold Bees
> Historically gold has maintained its value and is the best form of hedge against inflation and geo-political uncertainties
> Since price of gold is negatively correlated with price of stock, the former is a very effective portfolio diversifier
